summary: The diff successfully implements both requirements. REQ-1 is fully satisfied with updates to the <title> tag and all Open Graph meta tags in frontend/index.html. REQ-2 is partially satisfied with the hero section heading updated to 'The X' in HomePage.tsx, though the diff is truncated and doesn't show all user-facing text areas (footer, about sections, feature cards) to confirm complete removal of 'Beyblade X Teams' references.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update all user-facing text references from 'Beyblade X Teams' to 'The X' throughout the application
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows HomePage.tsx is truncated. While the hero section h1 is updated to 'The X', the acceptance criteria requires checking footer text, about text, and feature cards for complete removal of 'Beyblade X Teams'. The truncated diff prevents verification of all user-visible text areas.
